text: Bafa is a traditional dish in Cape Verde.Gastronomy at Viajar Cabo Verde, by SAPO CV] , accessed 31 January 2017 It is a stew made with limpets, whelks and octopus.General menu including bafa at Hotel Dunas in Sal It can be eaten as a snack, as an entr√©e, or as a main dish.Gastromony at the municipality of Ribeira Brava's website , accessed 31 January 2017 A variant is called Octopus bafa (Bafa de polvo). ==References== Category:Cape Verdean food Category:Seafood dishes
title: Bafa (food)
